controller.songplayer

Class SampledSongPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.songplayer.SampledSongPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player, SongInfosManager, SongPlayer

    public class SampledSongPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SongPlayer
    A Player of sampled song (wav song) this class exhibits method for managing the reproduction (play, stop, pause...) and the infos of a sampled track see also controller.SongPlayer
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini
